attributes.review:
Holllaaaaa niñooooooo AHHHHH
 This app is trash. Trump is trash. All men is trash except me and Timothée Shablagoo. Hate to hear it, hate to see it. When I downloaded this app I was on my way home and when I finally got to open it and see what it was about, I was sitting in my driveway and I was like “alright we’re here just sitting in the car🎹” I had no idea what I was getting into. I got on this app I thought it was a food ordering service like door dash or Uber eats. HOWEVERRRR, I was sadly mistaken. When I typed in “ILL HAVE THE TACOS PLEASE.” The response was not “tacos are not for breakfast.” In fact, the whole screen turned 🍊orange🍊and a face slowly started to fade in. AlI I could think was “please don’t be ugly. Please don’t be ugly. Pleeeaaase. Pleeaase.” Again, I was undoubtedly, utterly, and entirely disappointed as it became clear that the face belonged to Donald Trump. After about five minutes a banner flashed across the screen informing me that if I turned into a worm, trump wouldn’t love me. That was the last straw for me. I couldn’t take it anymore. It was truly traumatizing in every way imaginable. Here is a poem I wrote about my experience and time on this app. I climbed🧗out of my head💆‍♀️and watched👁 myself implode🧠🎊a thought☕️ without a body🧚🏼‍♂️ought to be🐝 the shot💪 to take📽 a load💃🏼 off my brain🧠is poisoned ☠️ and I’m searching🤳 for the antidote🥟 but every🦦 time I⏱ find it my defenses🧬 scream oh no🧲 you don’t🧶 whOAh🐗
attributes.title: ....................... ¿HELLO?👁👄👁
